text: Yabona! Sakuxelela (okokuba) “Inene iNkosi yakho Ibarhangqele abantu.” Kananjalo aSiwenzelanga nto yimbi umbono (wohambo lwakho ngobusuku oluya emazulwini) koko (Siwenzele ukuba) ube luvavanyo loluntu, nomthi weZa’kkûn, okhankanywe) kwi’Kur’ân. Siyabalumkisa Siboyikise kodwa akukho nto kubongezelela yona (oko) ngaphandle kobuhedeni, ingcinezelo nokungathobeli uAllâh
